content: I'll start with a review now and later comment which files are done in case somebody else want's to join in. Reviewing it alone will probably take some time :sweat_smile:

xFrednet said:

I'll start with a review now and later comment which files are done in case somebody else want's to join in. Reviewing it alone will probably take some time :sweat_smile:

Thanks! I already did a complete review on the Rust PR that introduced ExprKind::Let. So you can skip all the "trivial" changes in the PR.
I just wanted to get a second pair of eyes on the more complex / involved changes.
Even better, I luckily took a break until now xD
